column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////When we walked in there was an hour and a half wait for a table but we were lucky enough to find two seats at the bar. We got the pitcher of black raspberry sangria
column2: which is more than enough for 2 but is really good. We had never dined there before and the bartender recommended 2-3 plates per person so we got the fried chicken
column5: and the beef tenderloin. Everything was amazing and would definitely order them all again and we could barely finish all of it. Service was great
column6: food was delicious and I can't wait to go back and try everything else!
